name: Stair Builder
description:
The aim of the game is to keep the player away from the fire at the bottom of the screen.

In order to do this, a tower must be built between the two grey walls using the blocks provided on the right.

And the player Red Circle must be going up the tower.

- A/D or arrow right/left to move the play figure to the right and left.

- W, space or arrow up to jump

- Press left mouse button to pick up a block

- Release left mouse button to drop a block

- Click the right mouse button to reset a picked up block.

- Move the mouse while holding down the left mouse button to move a picked up block.
